Output:

The study mentioned in the text compared three types of BD models: single-parameter models based on SOC, multi-parameter models based on SOC, soil texture, and depth using multiple linear regression (MLR), and vis-NIRS based models using spectral information and partial least squares regression (PLSR). 

The results showed that single-parameter models with SOC had the lowest predictive potential and were not able to predict BD above 1.62 g cm(-3).
